name: DebugNums Fixed Code
code:
print(
    'The maximum of', intNum, 'and', floatNum, 'is',
    max(int(intNum), float(floatNum))
)
print(floatNum, 'rounded to an integer is', round(float(floatNum)))
print('The integer remainder of',  intNum, 'divided by 3 is', + int(intNum)%3)

# Tests involving an integer
intNum = input('Enter a nonnegative integer intNum: ')
print('The integer you entered is ' + intNum)
print('The integer quotient of', intNum, 'divided by 3 is', int(intNum)//3)

print(
    'The floating point quotient of', intNum,
    'divided by 3 is', int(intNum)/3
)
print(floatNum, 'truncated to an integer is', int(float(floatNum)))

# Tests involving a floating point number
floatNum = input('Enter a floating point number floatNum: ')
print('The number of digits in', intNum, 'is', len(intNum))
print(floatNum +  ' rounded to two places is ' + str(round(float(floatNum),2)))
print(intNum, 'concatenated copies of X is', int(intNum)*'X')
tests: '5 concatenated copies of X is XXXXX\n'
'The integer remainder of 5 divided by 3 is 2\n'
'The integer quotient of 5 divided by 3 is 1\n'
'The floating point quotient of 5 divided by 3 is {}\n'.format(5/3)
